attributes.action: clarify in writing his position on Tibet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, request that the Prime Minister and his government, in a clear statement express his position on Tibetan Independence/Autonomy and China's treatment of the Tibetan people.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
